name: Remove products from the shopping cart.
scenarioId: sauceDemo:Remove products from the shopping cart.
methodName: Remove products from the shopping cart.

testSteps.description: Given I have products in my shopping cart
When I remove a product from the cart
Then I can see that the product is no longer in my shopping cart

userStory.storyName: Login into saucedemo, add items to the shopping cart, remove products, and check the number of items in the cart.
userStory.displayName: Login into saucedemo, add items to the shopping cart, remove products, and check the number of items in the cart.
userStory.narrative:
As a client I want to login into saucedemo store to explore and buy products
	As a client I want to be able to add products to my shopping cart to select the products to buy
	As a client I want to be able to remove products from my shopping cart to remove products i don't want to buy

title: Remove products from the shopping cart.
